column6: Simon Archard has had a long string of partners and assistants, none more talented than Emma Bishop. And she'll need her talent now, more than ever --because there's a murderer in Partington who's targeting all of Archard's allies past and present!
column8: | penciller (cover):Butch Guice | penciller:Mirco Pierfederici | editor:Stephen Wacker | writer:Mark Waid
